fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Exterminate (Day, 2 uses): Use your magic powers to curse a player during the day, killing then instantly.

fields.name: Bind (Night):
fields.value: Bind 2 players souls together, causing the first player to perform their action on the seconds target, and vice versa.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Coven Heads, and the Coven Leader cannot spawn with you.
You have Necronomicon Priority.
Only 1 Coven Head may spawn per game.

fields.name: Necronomicon:
fields.value:
gain basic defense, as well as attacking your first target of Bind.

Detection immunity with the Necronomicon.
